CustomField.description: Indicates the status of documentation or paperwork associated with a case.
CustomField.label: Status of Papers

value.fullName: Property Papers Received at Destination Branch
value.label: Property Papers Received at Destination Branch

value.fullName: Collected by customer and acknowledgement sent to CPC
value.label: Collected by customer and acknowledgement sent to CPC

value.fullName: Not collected by customer. Paper re dispatched to CPC
value.label: Not collected by customer. Paper re dispatched to CPC

value.fullName: Customer Acknowledgement Received by CPC Storage
value.label: Customer Acknowledgement Received by CPC Storage

value.fullName: Property Papers Sent back and Received by CPC Storage
value.label: Property Papers Sent back by Branch and Received by CPC Storage
